title: FRIDAY, DECEMBER 29, 2023 Ad - Institute For Human Resources & Services, Inc - The Times Leader
text: Thank you for making us a Best Place to Work since 2018! Now Hiring The Institute for Human Resources & Services, Inc. is currently hiring: Now offering sign-on Direct Support Professionals: bonserN FLOR The primary responsibility is to assist adults with intellectual and developmental disabilities inside their homes. Full-time and part-time positions are available. Applicants must possess a valid PA driver's license and a high school diploma or equivalency. The base rate is $17.00 per hour and $17.50 per hour after the training period. Program Specialist: The ideal candidate will have knowledge and experience with individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities in a group home setting. The position is full-time and includes providing supervision and management to a residential program. A minimum of a Bachelor's Degree in Human Services or a related field combined with 2 to 4 years' experience is required. 250 Pierce Street Suite 301 Kingston, PA 18704 sweiss@ihrser.com .EOE Thank you for making us a Best Place to Work since 2018 !
